message: Let's split fairly, but I get a little extra for going first. This ensures we both benefit from acting quickly.

Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be practical.  We both lose money if this drags on. I'm proposing a slight adjustment in my favor, recognizing the time value and ensuring we both walk away with a good deal.
Bob, it's clear we both want this settled. I've adjusted my offer to be even closer to a 50/50 split, acknowledging the value of time. Let's close this deal.
